channel.title: mdf on 莫提时光

item.title: MSSQL attach mdf
item.description: https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/sql/relational-databases/databases/attach-a-database?view=sql-server-2017#to-attach-a-database-1 CREATE DATABASE Timeless ON (FILENAME = '/home/wuu/CSharp/Timeless.mdf'), (FILENAME = '/home/wuu/CSharp/Timeless_log.ldf') FOR ATTACH;
